job_title: Case Administrator in Newcastle upon Tyne, England

review_title: Rehabilitate offenders, protect the public? Not the case!
job_title: Supervisor in Newcastle upon Tyne, England
pros: We will never run out of offenders so in theory it is a fairly safe job.
cons: Once you begin to work for NPT you will discover that all managers have targets to reach and as such often dangerous behaviours, drug use and crimes go unreported in an effort to improve their targets.
